trans-unit.source: You create a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextDisposing> event to perform clean-up that is specific to the data context object before the object is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: Du oppretter et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextDisposing>-hendelsen for å utføre opprydding som er spesifikk for konteksten dataobjektet før objektet er ødelagt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextDisposing>

trans-unit.source: The LinqDataSourceDisposeEventArgs object contains the data context object that is used when you are selecting, updating, inserting, or deleting data.
trans-unit.target: LinqDataSourceDisposeEventArgs-objektet inneholder data context-objektet som skal brukes når du ved å velge, oppdatering, innsetting eller sletting av data.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextDisposing> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Unload> event before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control disposes the context object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextDisposing>hendelsen oppstår under den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Unload>hendelsen før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontrollen disposes context-objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Unload> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextDisposing>

trans-unit.source: The data context object is the type specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A> property or the type set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceContextEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceContextEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Data context-objektet er angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A>egenskapen eller type satt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceContextEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceContextEventArgs>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceContextEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceContextEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control interacts with a database, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext> object that represents the database.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontrollen samhandler med en database i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A>er satt til den <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext>objektet som representerer databasen.</xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control interacts with an in-memory data collection, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A> property is set to the object that contains the data collection.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontrollen samhandler med en samling med data i minnet, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A>er satt til objektet som inneholder datasamlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDisposeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDisposeEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The data context object to dispose.
Gets the data context object to dispose.
trans-unit.target: Henter data context-objektet til å fjerne.

trans-unit.source: The ObjectInstance property contains the data context object that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control uses for data operations.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ObjectInstance inneholder data context-objektet som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontrollen bruker for dataoperasjoner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: You can use the ObjectInstance property to retrieve the data context object if you want to examine the object before it is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke egenskapen ObjectInstance for å hente data context-objektet hvis du vil undersøke objektet før den er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control interacts with a database, the ObjectInstance property is set to the <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext> object that represents the database.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontrollen samhandler med en database, ObjectInstance-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext>objektet som representerer databasen.</xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control interacts with an in-memory data collection, the ObjectInstance property is set to the object that contains the data collection.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>kontrollen samhandler med en samling med data i minnet, ObjectInstance-egenskapen er satt til objektet som inneholder datasamlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the data context.
